items.name: page_size
items.label: Page Size:
items.tooltip: Size of each response back from the API. By default, when the plugin is installed it will default to 100. You can configure this in PowerSchool to a maximum of 1000

items.name: student_filter
items.label: Student Filter:
items.tooltip: Optional, Define a request filter for the Student table

items.name: student_expansions
items.label: Student Expansions
items.tooltip: Optional, Request expansions for the student table. Refer to the config_students table for possible values. Values should be comma delimited with no spaces

items.name: student_extensions
items.label: Student Extensions
items.tooltip: Optional, Request extensions for the student table. Refer to the config_students table for possible values. Values should be comma delimited with no spaces

items.name: staff_expansions
items.label: Staff Expansions
items.tooltip: Optional, Request expansions for the staff table. Refer to the config_staff table for possible values. Values should be comma delimited with no spaces

items.name: staff_extensions
items.label: Staff Extensions
items.tooltip: Optional, Request extensions for the staff table. Refer to the config_staff table for possible values. Values should be comma delimited with no spaces

items.name: section_filter
items.label: Section Filter:
items.tooltip: Optional, Define a request filter for the Sections table. (e.g. term.start_year==2024;)

items.name: term_filter
items.label: Term Filter:
items.tooltip: Optional, Define a request filter for the Terms table. (e.g. start_year==2024;)
